name: Toyota Hilux
description: The price of Toyota Hilux, a 5 seater Truck, ranges from Rs. 30.40  - 37.90 Lakh. It is available in 3 variants, with an engine of 2755 cc and a choice of 2 transmissions: Manual and Automatic. Hilux has an NCAP rating of 3 stars and comes with 7 airbags. Toyota Hilux is available in 5 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 11.2 to 13 kmpl for Hilux.

variants.variant_name: Hilux STD 4X4 MT 2755 cc, Diesel, Manual, 201 bhp
Hilux High 4X4 MT 2755 cc, Diesel, Manual, 201 bhp
Hilux High 4X4 AT 2755 cc, Diesel, Automatic (TC), 201 bhp
